events.message: The insured reported a car collision that occurred on 2024-04-29 involving their vehicle and a streetlight.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to the reported damage on the insured car.
A claims agent was assigned to handle the case and will be responsible for guiding the insured through the process.
The insured received confirmation that their claim had been acknowledged and is now under active review.
The agent requested photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
Insured submitted all requested documents including photos, police report, and written repair quotes.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted documents and inspecting the vehicle to assess damage and liability.
All facts have been verified and the investigation concluded confirming the insuredâ€™s vehicle sustained significant front-end damage.
A settlement amount based on estimated repairs was proposed to the insured for approval or further discussion.
The insured expressed dissatisfaction with the initial settlement offer citing higher repair costs.
Due to the customer feedback, the claim was escalated to a senior adjuster for re-evaluation of the settlement.
The revised settlement was approved reflecting the higher repair estimate as agreed with the insured.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was issued to the insured for vehicle repairs.
The claim was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and repair completion by the insured.
The case file was archived for future reference and audit purposes following closure of the claim.
